page.title: 14Transport
page.content: You need a car if you live in this area because there are no shops. Our nearest train service is in Market Harborough.If you want to go to London you would go to Harborough to catch a bus or train.Lots of people use bicycles.There are very few buses going through our villages.A few go daily to Market Harborough,but not on Sundays. How children travel to our school: Out of 66 children,21 walk,2 cycle,11 come by car and 32 by bus. In our school 20 families own 2 cars 18 own 1 car and 4 have no car.Three families own 6 cycles,3 own 5 cycles, 9 own 4 cycles,8 own 3 cycles,12 own 2 cycles and 7 families own 1 cycle.9 families have a motorbike and 5 own a caravan.
